1408:2: ādau ca bhagavatyahaṅkāramavalambya om sumbha nisumbha hū hū phaṭ|
1408:3: om gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hū hū phaṭ|
1408:4: om gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya hū hū phaṭ|
1408:5: om ānaya ho bhagavan vajra hū hū phaḍiti caturmukhamantrairdigbandhaṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe tryakṣareṇa bhūmimadhiṣṭhāya kuṅkumaraktacandanādisarāgasugandhidravyaiḥ om ā gā rā ḍe mā kā pre tri kā ka ra ka hi pra gu so lu ma ku |
1408:6: pūrvoktacaturmukhamantrāṇāmekaikamantroccāraṇapūrvakaṃ pūrvādiṣu vāmāvartena vāmahastena caturasraṃ maṇḍalaṃ kārayet|
1408:7: pū jā ityādi caturviṃśatyakṣarapīṭhopapīṭhakṣetropakṣetracchandohopacchandohamelāpakopamelāpaka śmaśānopaśmaśānoccāraṇamapi kartavyamiti kecidāmnāyavidaḥ|
1408:8: tato vāmakarānāmikāgre ṣaṭkoṇamaṇḍalamadhyavilasitavakāraṃ bahiḥ pūrvādidikkrameṇa vinirmitacatuḥ svastikaṃ vilikhya om vajrarekhe hū svāhā iti rekhāmākṛṣya om surekhe sarvatathāgatādhitiṣṭhantu svāheti rekhāmadhitiṣṭhet|
1408:9: tata ākrāntapādordhvadṛṣṭistu mūrdhnā pheṃkāranādato jvālāmudrāṃ baddhavā vāmāvartena bhrāmayet|
1408:10: jaḥ hū va hoḥ ityādi karṣaṇādimantrapuraḥ saramakaniṣṭhabhuvanavartinīṃ devīmākṛṣya praveśya baddhāṃ kṛtvā paritoṣayet|
1408:12: sya śmaśānasya madhye nṛtyantīṃ bhāvanayā abhimukhīkṛtya mantroddhārotthitahṛdayamantreṇaiva devīṃ raktavarṇakusumairarcayet|
1408:13: tataḥ om va ho yo hrī mo he hrī hra hra phaṭ iti mantraistryakṣaramantramilitaiḥ ṣaḍdevīsambodhanapādavidarbhitaiḥ ṣaṭkoṇeṣu ṣaḍdevīrarcayet|
1408:14: om āḥ nandyāvarta hū phaṭ iti nandyāvartānapi caturdikṣu pūjayet|
